title: Sylvian & Fripp - two thieves:strung up (upmix DVD)
description:
David Sylvian & Robert Fripp - Live In Japan at Nakano Sunplaza 26-10-1993.  Also known as &#039;The Road To Graceland&#039; but this version is called &#039;two thieves : strung up&#039; to denote it as different from previous releases.

Source: Original Japanese NTSC laserdisc

Lineage: Captured using Pioneer CLD-1750 / recorded to Sony RDR-HX510 at HSQ / cloned to DVD & ripped using DVD Decrypter 3.5.2.0.

Surround Mix: Up-sampled to 32bit/48khz & surround upmix in Nuendo 2 / encoded to AC3 5.1 @ 320kbs using Apple Compresor.

DVD authoring: DVD Studio Pro 4

This is a bit of a labour of love.  My previous versions suffered from a lipsynch issue that wouldn&#039;t go away.  Not anymore though.  A corrupt disc has meant that I&#039;ve had to start this from scratch and an opportunity to sort out the synching issue.

Tracks:

God&#039;s Monkey
Brightness Falls
Every Colour You Are
Jean the Birdman
Firepower
Damage
Exposure
Gone to Earth
20th Century Dreaming
Wave
Riverman
Darshan
The First Day
Blinding Light of Heaven 

Band: David Sylvian / Robert Fripp / Trey Gunn / Pat Mastelotto / Michael Brook

Includes: Menus / cover / a couple of wallpapers made from menus that I abandoned(!)

Enjoy!
